title: SOLD: T5 Pinkerton cabinet Danny Murphy - SGC A

posts.post_title: SOLD: T5 Pinkerton cabinet Danny Murphy - SGC A
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm selling the pictured T5 Pinkerton Cabinet card of Danny Murphy of the Philadelphia A's. These are impossible to find, so the damaged cardboard mount should be excusable in this case. 

Price is $zzz delivered for this rarity - thanks for looking!
Scott
